Key Match Events: Pascal Siakam led the charge with 26 points
Tyrese Haliburton continued his impressive play with 16 points and 13 assists
Zach LaVine scored 31 points but struggled to keep pace with Indiana's offensive firepower
Others: The Indiana Pacers cruised to a convincing 129-113 victory over the Chicago Bulls
Thomas Bryant added a season-high 22 points and 8 rebounds
